verses.verse: Every <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2814>branch<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> that <S%G5342>beareth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> he taketh away: <S%G142><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> branch that <S%G5342>beareth<s%> <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> he <S%G2508>purgeth<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it may bring <S%G5342>forth<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>
Now <S%G2235><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G2513>clean<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> unto you. <S%G5213><s%>

Abide <S%G3306><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> and <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%> <S%G2531>As<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2814>branch<s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> bear <S%G5342><s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1438>itself,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> it <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G288>vine;<s%> <S%G3761>no<s%> <S%G3779>more<s%> can <S%G5210>ye,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> ye <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> me. <S%G1698><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G288>vine,<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> are <S%G3588>the<s%> branches: <S%G2814><s%> He that <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> and <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> bringeth <S%G5342>forth<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> fruit: <S%G2590><s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> ye can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

If a man abide not <S%G3362><s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> he is <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1854>forth<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2814>branch,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is <S%G3583>withered;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> men <S%G4863>gather<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they are burned. <S%G2545><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> ye <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> ye shall <S%G154>ask<s%> what <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> ye <S%G2309>will,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it shall be <S%G1096>done<s%> unto you. <S%G5213><s%>

Herein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> is <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1392>glorified,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye <S%G5342>bear<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2590>fruit;<s%> <S%G2532>so<s%> shall ye <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G1698>my<s%> disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

As <S%G2531><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> Father <S%G3962>hath<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> so have I loved <S%G2504><s%> <S%G25><s%> you: <S%G5209><s%> <S%G3306>continue<s%> ye <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> love. <S%G26><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> ye <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> ye shall <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G26>love;<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father's<s%> <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> love. <S%G26><s%>

These <S%G5023>things<s%> have I <S%G2980>spoken<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> might <S%G3306>remain<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> might be full. <S%G4137><s%>
This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G2443>That<s%> ye <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> I have <S%G25>loved<s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

Greater <S%G3187><s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> than <S%G5026>this,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> lay <S%G5087>down<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> friends. <S%G5384><s%>
Ye <S%G5210><s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5384>friends,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> ye <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3745>whatsoever<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1781>command<s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>

Henceforth I call you not <S%G3765><s%> <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5209><s%> servants; <S%G1401><s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2962>lord<s%> doeth: <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> I have <S%G2046>called<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G5384>friends;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I have <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> I have made <S%G1107>known<s%> unto you. <S%G5213><s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1586>chosen<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G1586>chosen<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5087>ordained<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> should <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> bring <S%G5342>forth<s%> <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> should remain: <S%G3306><s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> whatsoever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> ye shall <S%G154>ask<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> he may <S%G1325>give<s%> it you. <S%G5213><s%>
These <S%G5023>things<s%> I <S%G1781>command<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye <S%G25>love<s%> one another. <S%G240><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G3404>hate<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> ye <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G4412>before<s%> it hated you. <S%G5216><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> ye <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> would love <S%G5368><s%> <S%G302><s%> his own: <S%G2398><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G1586>chosen<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G3404>hateth<s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

Remember <S%G3421><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> The <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3187>greater<s%> than <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G2962>lord.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> they have <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> <S%G1691>me,<s%> they will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1377>persecute<s%> <S%G5209>you;<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> they have <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> they will <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G5212>yours<s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> will they <S%G4160>do<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> for my name's sake, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3686><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> him that <S%G3992>sent<s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> I had <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2980>spoken<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> they had <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> sin: <S%G266><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4392>cloak<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>
He that <S%G3404>hateth<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G3404>hateth<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> I had <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> other <S%G243>man<s%> <S%G4160>did,<s%> they had <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> sin: <S%G266><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> have they <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> this cometh to pass, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> that is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> They <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> without a cause. <S%G1432><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3875>Comforter<s%> is <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G3992>send<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> even <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1607>proceedeth<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1565>he<s%> shall <S%G3140>testify<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> me: <S%G1700><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> shall bear <S%G3140>witness,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> ye have <S%G2075>been<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the beginning. <S%G746><s%>
